description: Detects the use of getsystem Meterpreter/Cobalt Strike command by detecting a specific service installation
name: Meterpreter or Cobalt Strike Getsystem Service Installation
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"4697" AND ((winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*cmd* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\/c* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*echo* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\\pipe\\*) OR (winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*%COMSPEC%* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\/c* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*echo* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\\pipe\\*) OR (winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*cmd.exe* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\/c* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*echo* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\\pipe\\*) OR (winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*rundll32* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*.dll,a* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\/p\:*)))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov
Ecco
Florian Roth
